@NonNullByDefault

Package com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition

Service composition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCompositeService<I extends Request,​O extends Response>
    A skeletal Service implementation that enables composing multiple Services into one.
    AbstractCompositeServiceBuilder<T extends AbstractCompositeServiceBuilder<T,​I,​O>,​I extends Request,​O extends Response>
    A skeletal builder implementation for AbstractCompositeService and its subclasses.
    CompositeServiceEntry<I extends Request,​O extends Response>
    A pair of a PathMapping and a Service bound to it.
    SimpleCompositeService<I extends Request,​O extends Response>
    A general purpose AbstractCompositeService implementation.
    SimpleCompositeServiceBuilder<I extends Request,​O extends Response>
    A general purpose AbstractCompositeServiceBuilder implementation.
